meta.title: FutureOfDev Research Matrix
meta.approach: Qualitative capability matrix with weighted composite scoring

dimensions.name: Context Awareness

dimensions.name: Extensibility

dimensions.description: Support for diverse LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, local, regional)

dimensions.name: Ecosystem Lock-in

dimensions.name: Sustainability
dimensions.description: Team health, community activity, licensing, longevity risk

dimensions.name: Cost Efficiency
